) that most of the patriotic baubles sold in gift shops in George Washington DC, including busts of US Presidents from George Washington to Barack Obama , are made in China( which wasn't exactly breaking news). It appears that a museum owned by the people George Washington , celebrating the history George Washington , can not find companies in this country employing George Washington workers that are able to manufacture statues of our founding fathers, or our current president, Barack Obama Sen. Bernie Sanders fumed in a letter to the Director of the Smithsonian Museum.`` That is pretty pathetic! I was not aware that the collapse of our manufacturing base had gone that far.

Robert Gates .`` The heartbreaking thing with respect to Guantanamo is not that there's anything wrong with it, it's one of the finest prison systems in the world,'' said Donald Rumsfeld . 's 25th season is being filmed in Las Vegas.`` Everything in Vegas is on a grander scale, and that comes through loud and clear this season,'' MTV told People in a statement. named antiquities minister in a new Cabinet appointed by besieged President Hosni Mubarak , said the survival of Egypt's rich archaeological heritage amid chaos reflected a fundamental pride among Egyptians even as they revolt against their leadership.
